Description.Text:
Position The Hotel Club Torre Xiare is on the slopes of Mount Erice and is characterized by the fascination aroused by the watch tower of the second half of XIV century from which it takes its name. Its superb location, combined with the proximity to the sea (350 m.), provides natural cultural and historical itineraries of incomparable beauty.
Restaurant Our restaurant combines the Mediterranean culinary tradition with the pleasure and taste of Sicilian cuisine. The service is buffet style or table according to the amount of guests.
